page.title: 13 Fire Service
page.content: Great Missenden fire station is a retained station.This means that it is not manned all the time.At Great Missenden there are ten firemen on call,six of them can drive the fire engine.This can reach speeds of up to 80mph.The machinery used for fire fighting consists of:1 fire engine,1 pump,5 canisters of foam,breathing equipment,tool kits,anti-chimney fire kit,hydraulic cutting gear,ladders, bleeper and a C.B. The uniform is a helmet,boots,leggings and a jacket.To join you must be 5'8" or over and have a 2" chest expansion.You must also have good eyesight. The ranks are as follows:Station Officer,sub-officer,leading fireman and fireman.The area covered by Gt. Missenden is:Wendover Dean,Hyde Heath, Lee Common,Gt.Missenden,Lt.Kingshill, Lt.Missenden and Hampden.
